controller

Class RecordValidationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.RecordValidationController

  • public class RecordValidationController
extends java.lang.Object
    Validates the files to bootstrap or upload and stores error records

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RecordValidationController()
      Constructor for RecordValidationController which adds the list of schools into the Hashmap of schools

    • Method Detail

      • validateDemographics

        public boolean validateDemographics(java.sql.Connection conn,
                           java.lang.String[] line,
                           int rowNum,
                           java.lang.String fileName)
        Returns if the line in Demographics file is valid or not
        Parameters:
        conn - stores the connection to process the request
        line - stores entire entry to be validated
        rowNum - indicates the row number where this line is found
        fileName - indicates the file to which this line belongs to
        Returns:
        a boolean value which indicates if this line is valid

      • validateLocation

        public boolean validateLocation(java.sql.Connection conn,
                       java.lang.String[] line,
                       int rowNum,
                       java.lang.String fileName,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> successfulLocationRecordList,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> successfulRowCountList,
                       boolean isBootstrap)
        Returns if the line in Location file is valid or not
        Parameters:
        conn - stores the connection object to process the connection
        line - stores entire entry to be validated
        rowNum - indicates the row number where this line is found
        fileName - indicates the file to which this line belongs to
        successfulLocationRecordList - the current rows which are successfully validated
        successfulRowCountList - the current row count to which the current rows are validated
        isBootstrap -
        Returns:
        a boolean value which indicates if this line is valid
